artist: Arthur Rackham; Text by Thomas Ingoldsby; J.M. Dent Co., London; E.F. Dutton and Company , New York; Ballantyne Press , London, (text); Graphic Photo Engraving Co., Edinburgh , (reproductions)

title: The Ingoldsby Legends or Mirth and Marvels
